Title: Killing Time.
Subtitle: An Inspector Bill Slider Mystery.
Authors: Cynthia Harrod-Eagles.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=1G1LIqJGdN0C&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: When a male erotic dancer who asked him for help is killed, Slider probes the victim's sordid career amid seedy nightclubs, prostitutes, and unconventional cabinet ministers, and he links the killing to that of a popular constable. Reprint. PW. K. NYT..
